instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00239 Touch does not work
threads.message: This mac has a bubble on Flat J4402, I replaced the Topcase along with touch bar, in testing it worked, but then it stopped. I replaced the Q4400, but it didn't work. The LCD in the Bar Works.

threads.title: 820-00239 Touch does not work
threads.message:
Check voltage on pins 20, 21, 22.
Do you get login to macOS, or critical update error comes up?

threads.title: 820-00239 Touch does not work
threads.message:
So you get backlight on touchbar, but no image, nor reaction to touch on it?

Did you test with another known good touchbar?

threads.title: 820-00239 Touch does not work
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 92883, member: 682"]
So you get backlight on touchbar, but no image, nor reaction to touch on it?
[/QUOTE]
Exactly.
I tested it with two Topcases and it works perfectly.
Shouldn't it be 1.8V on pin 20/21? I am testing with the Flat touch disconnected and the LCD of the BAR connected.

threads.title: 820-00239 Touch does not work
threads.message:
Check U4404 for I/O short.

"I tested it with two Topcases and it works perfectly."
Works correctly what, the main board???
